Articles.Content:
Stock KSP is missing the following size parts:

- SAS wheels
- docking ports
- batteries
- ore tanks
- monopropellant tanks

as a result, I'm stuck using mods or 3rd party parts.

please add more Size3.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T23:13:08Z" title="05/26/2015 11:13  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by Xyphos**

Agreed with the SAS and ore tanks, but these are heavy launcher parts, they are not supposed to be docked... and the 2.5m battery already feels huge and lasts pretty much forever, do you really need a bigger one ?

I would love some 3.75m adapters and bi-tri-quadcouplers myself. We only have a single huge empty long and heavy one

> 
> Agreed with the SAS and ore tanks, but these are heavy launcher parts, they are not supposed to be docked... and the 2.5m battery already feels huge and lasts pretty much forever, do you really need a bigger one ?
> I would love some 3.75m adapters and bi-tri-quadcouplers myself. We only have a single huge empty long and heavy one

Pretty much what he said, and I agree that even the 2.5m batteries go on for ever and ever and ever...

> 
> do you really need a bigger one ?

capacity isn't the issue, it's just the size. we could have a 2000 capacity size3 batter for all i care, i just want the size support.

EDIT: better idea: nerf the size2 down to 1200, have a 4000 size3

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T23:55:05Z" title="05/26/2015 11:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by Xyphos**
The Taurus HCV mod implements that well by combining the RW and battery for their 3.75m part
We need Mk3 space pants to go with the Mk2 space pants we already have.

- Poddle-engine equivalent - short, single-nozzle upper stage engine.
- SAS
- Stack Separator
- Service bay (so we could hide all these radial scientific items inside)
- Ore tank (both: short and long)
- Monoprop tank
- Size-3 equivalent of Hitchhiker Storage Container / landing can
- Size-3 equivalent of Lab? (shorter but wider)
- If not a battery then a fuel cell? Or heavy RTG? (in a shape of battery instead of radial)
- Size 3 -> 5x Size 1 adapter?
- ^ If you'll add that adapter - also add liquid fuel tank
- Twin-inline-docking port (one dock above, one dock below, for large inter-planetary missions with landers)

> 
> We need Mk3 space pants to go with the Mk2 space pants we already have.

It's Size 3, not Mk. 3. As in: rockets, not planes.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-27T12:48:59Z" title="05/27/2015 12:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 27, 2015</time> by Sky\_walker**
